name: AFlame
description:
Hey guys!

We are a small team: Timo and Félix.

This game is made for the ScoreSpace  Jam #15 with the theme: "One bullet".

(ScoreSpace Jam 15)

AFlame is a small game with candle and plants spirits.

You control Kandle the flame and you can move everywhere you want.

However your life is limited in the time,  your flame weakened...

One solution, take the body of plants spirits to live a few more time...

Enjoy survive and fire.

Controls: touch mouse + WASD or ZQSD, P or Escape for Pause
